p: Plot albedos were estimated from directional reflectance measurements collected once from each plot from 29 October to 5 November 2014 using a spectro-goniometer system coupled with an Analytical Spectral Devices (ASD) FieldSpec 3 spectroradiometer. The spectro-goniometer system collected multiple spectral radiance (W m −2 nm −1 sr −1) measurements at specific zenith (−30°, −15°, Nadir/0°, 15°, 30°) and azimuth (0°, 45°, 270°, 315°) angles to first calculate hemispherical-conical reflectance factor (HCRF) spectra and then estimate albedo ( Supplementary Information Fig. S5). The spectral radiance measurements covered the wavelength range of 350–2500 nm with 3–10 nm spectral resolution using an 8° field-of-view attachment.
